name: Vacuumarine
description:
This is Vacuumarine, a vacuum cleaner-submarine that was created to detect and suck in plastic bottles scattered over the seas. Click to accelerate the vacuumarine and collect as many bottles as you can. 

This is an entry for the SeaJam hosted by PolyMars and dedicated to TeamSeas, an initiative of cleaning seas by MrBeast.

Note: I did not have my computer with me, so this was made in Scratch which is a really terrible game engine, so if there are any bugs, spare me.
